message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30.  It's best to settle this quickly while the money is still worth a lot to you.
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start, and we can both get a good amount.
Okay, Bob, time to get serious. I'll take a little less - $65 - but you need to agree now before inflation eats away at your share even more.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share than 35 to make this worthwhile for me. Let's split it 60-40,  you get the bigger share, but I still get something reasonable.
